name: Antonio Tamburello
title: Senior Lead Frontend Engineer · Technical Lead & Frontend Architect
bio: I lead frontend teams and ship full-stack web products—design systems, responsive UI/UX, and clean, maintainable code. Exploring GenAI and applied AI.

highlights.title: Technical Leadership
highlights.description: Lead multiple frontend teams and coordinate delivery across projects—building scalable UI systems, mentoring engineers, and keeping teams moving fast.

highlights.title: Fast Product Delivery
highlights.description: Rapid delivery with production-grade quality—e.g., led frontend execution for a B2B social listening MVP in ~3 months.

highlights.title: UI/UX & Performance Mindset
highlights.description: Strong attention to design systems, responsiveness, animations, and performance across modern web apps.

highlights.title: GenAI Prototyping
highlights.description: In my spare time, I prototype GenAI-powered tools and workflows—testing ideas quickly and keeping what’s actually useful.

highlights.title: SaaS & MVP Builder
highlights.description: I regularly ship side projects and SaaS experiments—validating ideas fast with clean foundations and rapid iteration.

highlights.title: Continuous Learner
highlights.description: I’m passionate about learning new technologies and improving my skills through courses, reading, and hands-on projects.
